title: #45: Part 2 of Our analysis of the "interrogation" of Rudy Guede by the Prosecutor and police.
description:
Jim Clemente and Laura Richards continue to analyze and discuss the official so-called "interrogation" of Rudy Guede with Lisa Zambetti.

#HerNameWasMeredith
